summary: EXHAUST MANIFOLD/CATALYTIC CONVERTER ASSY. IS BADLY CRACKED.  MANIFOLD/CONVERTER MAKES NOISE AND EXHAUST CAN BE SMELLED IN PASSENGER COMPARTMENT.  MANIFOLD/CONVERTER ASSY. WAS ALREADY REPLACED ONCE AT APPROX. 50,000 MILES FOR THE SAME PROBLEM.  THE PROBLEM WAS NOTICED AGAIN AT APPROX. 100,000 MILES.  *JB
